description: Define variables with tuple binding pattern.
code: [string, int, string] [name, age, address] = ["Jack Smith", 23, "380 Lakewood Dr. Desoto, TX 75115"];
println("Name: ", name, " Age: ", age, " Address: ", address);
stdout: Name: Jack Smith Age: 23 Address: 380 Lakewood Dr. Desoto, TX 75115

description: Assign values with tuple binding pattern.
Nested define variables with tuple binding pattern.

code: println("Event Id: ", eventId, " Score 1: ", score1, " Score 2: ", score2, " Score 3: ", score3)
stdout: Event Id: E335 Score 1: 9.8 Score 2: 9.6 Score 3: 9.5
